## CustomCSS.installLegacyTheme() method

Install a legacy theme using the pre-v1.0.0 theme download pipeline<br> Will create a corresponding. dummy manifest for the theme.

**Signature:**

```typescript
installLegacyTheme(options: InstallThemeOptions): Promise<void>;
```
